attributes.action: Award a George Cross to PC Wayne Marques of the London Bridge terror attack.
attributes.background: PC Wayne Marks is the police officer who single handedly took on the three terrorist's from the London Bridge terror attack of 3rd June 2017. His bravery saved lives. The George Cross is awarded "for acts of the greatest heroism or for most conspicuous courage in circumstance of extreme danger"

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour.

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour, including the George Cross, here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
